title: 各位大神看看，这个是怎么回事？崩溃了
author: fantaomi
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to F:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-28_18.54.39-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 2b5ed57e --------
Full report at:
F:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-28_18.54.39-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-6-28 下午6:54

-- System Details --
Details:

replies.author: 游侠STW
replies.txt_content:
Mod安装的问题导致游戏崩溃
建议
首先用备份覆盖现有的minecraft.jar文件来恢复
（你没有备份？那就重装吧 = =）
之后核对游戏版本与Mod版本
按照既定步骤Mod即可

安装步骤
1.是否删除minecraft.jar中的NATA-IF（差不多这名字）文件夹
2.游戏版本是否和Mod需求的游戏版本匹配
3.是否安装Mod需要的基础Mod

放进去的是解压后的Mod的文件
也将Mod的文件夹可以放进加载过ModLoader游戏后生成的Mods文件夹内（有些基础Mod不适用）
